statements: DELETE FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 1 AND maintenance_type = 'routine';
DELETE FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE technician_id = 101 AND equipment_name = 'Generator X' AND maintenance_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM maintenance_log WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL OR maintenance_interval > '2 months';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE schedule_date <= '2022-01-01' AND status = 'Due';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE technician_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 1 AND maintenance_interval > 30;
